name: Ice queens and sirens of the sea
description: Sports stars and mythological creatures on-screen.

key_work.title: Wintertime
key_work.brief_description: Nora and her uncle get railroaded into spending the night at a broken-down hotel in Canada. After Nora falls for the handsome owner, she convinces her uncle to invest in the inn and modernize it. After the hotel opens, Nora’s uncle faces financial ruin and her romance hit a snag in the form of pretty reporter.

end.title: Neptune's Daughter
end.brief_description: The daughter of King Neptune takes on human form to avenge the death of her young sister, who was caught in a fishing net. However, she falls in love with the king, the man she holds responsible.

constellations_other.name: Film firsts
constellations_other.description: The early days of cinema were an exciting period of experimentation, with many inventors racing to come up with their own moving-image devices.

constellations_other.name: Ice queens and sirens of the sea
constellations_other.description: Sports stars and mythological creatures on-screen.

links.description: The trend of films being built around a star’s special skill did not start with Henie, Australian swimmer Annette Kellermann who made a number films during the silent period featuring her performing in the water

end.title: Million Dollar Mermaid
end.brief_description: After overcoming polio, Annette Kellerman achieves fame and creates a scandal when her one-piece bathing suit is considered indecent.

constellations_other.name: Film firsts
constellations_other.description: The early days of cinema were an exciting period of experimentation, with many inventors racing to come up with their own moving-image devices.

constellations_other.name: Ice queens and sirens of the sea
constellations_other.description: Sports stars and mythological creatures on-screen.

links.description: Films built around the swimming skills of its leading lady hit their peak with Esther Williams’ “aquamusicals”. Always on the outlook for plots that provided opportunities to swim, Million Dollar Mermaid is a biopic of Annette Kellermann’s life.

start.title: Million Dollar Mermaid
start.brief_description: After overcoming polio, Annette Kellerman achieves fame and creates a scandal when her one-piece bathing suit is considered indecent.

end.title: Miranda
end.creator_credit: Betty E. Box and Denis Waldock
end.brief_description: A young married physician discovers a mermaid, and gives into her request to be taken to see London. Comedy and romantic entanglements ensue soon after.

constellations_other.name: Ice queens and sirens of the sea
constellations_other.description: Sports stars and mythological creatures on-screen.

links.description: Rather than focusing on humans who can swim like a fish, Miranda is the story of a mermaid who is caught during a fishing trip and the chaos that ensues trying to keep her watery identity a secret.

start.title: Miranda
start.creator_credit: Betty E. Box and Denis Waldock
start.brief_description: A young married physician discovers a mermaid, and gives into her request to be taken to see London. Comedy and romantic entanglements ensue soon after.

end.title: Local Hero
end.brief_description: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don’t go as expected.

constellations_other.name: Ice queens and sirens of the sea
constellations_other.description: Sports stars and mythological creatures on-screen.

links.description: Unlike Miranda who is most definitely a mermaid, mystery surrounds Marina the marine biologist in Local Hero whose webbed feet and swimming prowess hint at something fishy in her DNA
